title: Goats cheese and spinach filo pastry with spicy roasted red pepper sauce
ingredients: ['For the pastry', 'small bunch fresh spinach', '1/2 onion, finely chopped', '1 tablespoon oil', 'small pinch chilli flakes or fresh chilli, finely chopped', 'pinch cumin seeds', '2 sheets filo pastry', '100g goats cheese', 'oil or melted butter for brushing the pastry', 'For the sauce', '2 tablespoons olive oil', '1 small onion, chopped', '1 red chillis, seeds removed, chopped', '1 clove garlic, crushed', '1 jar roasted peppers, drained, roughly chopped', '1 teaspoon balsamic vinegar', '1/2 teaspoon caster sugar', 'small bunch fresh basil', 'pinch pepper']
